settings.quote: "This kit is the perfect fill-in for a well designed trauma package! It could mean the difference between life or death!"
settings.author: - Michael B.

settings.quote: "Love it! We are both ER nurses and have one in each of our cars and our camper. Everything you could need in case of an emergency. Highly recommend."
settings.author: - Eleanor T.

settings.quote: "The most complete kit on the market. Quality equipment and one step short of being a full-blown ambulance."
settings.author: - Glenn G.

settings.title: About us
settings.text: Our goal at My Medic is to prepare you with the equipment and training for the unexpected emergency.

settings.title: 4-ibuprofen
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Treats fever and mild to severe pain. *Compare to active ingredient in Advil

settings.title: 2-APAP
settings.tooltip_descrtipion:
Used to treat mild to moderate pain and to reduce fever.
*Compare to active ingredients in Tylenol

settings.title: 2-aspirin
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Aspirin is a common drug for relieving minor aches, pains, and fevers. Also can be used as a anti-inflammatory or a blood thinner.

settings.title: 2-diotame
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Used to treat occasional upset stomach, heartburn, and nausea.

settings.title: 2-medi-meclizine
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Used to prevent and treat nausea, vomiting, and dizziness caused by motion sickness.

settings.title: 2-diphen
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Used to relieve symptoms of allergy, hay fever, and the common cold.

settings.title: 2-diamode
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Used to treat sudden diarrhea.

settings.title: 2-decorel-forte-plus
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Used to temporarily treat cough, chest congestion, fever, body aches, and stuffy nose symptoms caused by the common cold, flu, or other breathing illnesses.

settings.title: 4-antiseptic-wipe
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Cleans cuts, scrapes and burns.

settings.title: 4-hand-sanitizer
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Single-use packets of hand sanitizer.

settings.title: 1-iodine-prep-pad
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: For antiseptic skin preparation.

settings.title: 3-triple-antibiotic
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Helps prevent and treat most minor skin infections.

settings.title: 2-lip-balm
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Moisturize and relieve chapped or dry lips.

settings.title: 2-sunscreen
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Protects your skin from prolonged exposure.

settings.title: 2-sting-relief
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Provides temporary relief from pain and itching caused by insect stings and bites.

settings.title: 1-white-petrolatum
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Used as a moisturizer to treat or prevent dry, rough, scaly, itchy skin and minor skin irritations.

settings.title: 2-hydrocortisone-cream
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Used to treat redness, swelling, itching, and discomfort of various skin conditions.

settings.title: 2-oral-pain-relief
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Used to relieve pain in your mouth.

settings.title: 1-ammonia-towelette
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Prevents and treats dizziness and fainting.

settings.title: 1-chamois-butter
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Soothes chafed or irritated skin.

settings.title: 2-kokos
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Delicious & hydrating blend of vitamins and minerals for exercise and on-the-go.

settings.title: 2-aqua-tabs
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Water disinfection tablets.

settings.title: 1-finger-splint
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Stabilize the finger and control the movement.

settings.title: 1-sensi-wrap-2x15
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Lightweight compression bandage which sticks to itself.

settings.title: 1-triangular-bandage
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Used as an arm sling, cover for head dressing, binding for splint or as a tourniquet.

settings.title: 1-elastic-bandage
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Puts pressure on the tissue around an injury to decrease pain and swelling.

settings.title: 1-pen-light
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Used to assess the pupil diameter.

settings.title: 1-tweezer
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Used for removing slivers or for items too small for fingers.

settings.title: 1-thermometer
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Used to take body temperature.

settings.title: 5-thermometer-sheaths
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Used to protector thermometer tip.

settings.title: 1-whistle
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Used for alerting in case of emergency.

settings.title: 1-liquid-skin
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Used to hold skin together for small wounds.

settings.title: 1-saline-wash
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Saline wash for irrigating wounds or eyes

settings.title: 1-small-cold-pack
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Rapidly activated, disposable chemical ice pack used to relieve pain and reduce swelling

settings.title: 1-small-emt-shears
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Cut your way out of most anything.

settings.title: 2-gloves
settings.tooltip_descrtipion: 2 disposable pairs of gloves

settings.tooltip_descrtipion: Thermal insulation blanket designed to reflect 90% of body heat

settings.title: Become an ambassador
settings.subtitle: Apply Today
settings.text: Our vision is to “be the good” and help the helpless in all we do, allowing our patrons to Experience Elevated First Aid. We are here to empower ordinary people and help them understand they are capable of protecting, saving, and preserving the lives of all those they come across. To do this we provide the highest quality first aid products available.

settings.title: gavin godfrey
settings.bio_description: Our vision is to “be the good” and help the helpless in all we do,allowing our patrons to Experience Elevated First Aid. We are here to empower ordinary people and help them understand they arecapable of protecting, saving, and preserving the lives of all those they come across. To do this we provide the highest quality first aid products available. Further, we equip professionals with the life saving tools they need each day to successfully perform their labors.

settings.content: Our mission is to empower people with the skills, knowledge, and supplies to save lives.

settings.title: OUR STORY
settings.content:
My Medic was born after a tragic car accident took the life of a loved one. Lack of equipment, proper training, and a long wait for emergency medical services to arrive led to an unnecessary death.

Our goal at My Medic is to prepare you with the equipment and training for the unexpected emergency.

settings.title: Ready for life
settings.content:
Life can be dangerous. Whether you’re at home, in your vehicle, or out on an adventure, our products are ready to perform when you need them most.

Our first aid kits are stocked with the highest quality gear, convenient features, and speciality tools that you won’t find anywhere else. Experience Elevated First Aid.
